meanings.definition: A religion other than one of the main world religions, specifically a polytheistic or nature-worshipping religion.
meanings.sent1: Paganism celebrates many gods and goddesses.
meanings.sent2: Her family follows the traditions of paganism.
meanings.sent3: In the land of paganism, even the trees are said to have spirits.
meanings.sent4: The colorful tapestry of paganism weaves together the elements of nature.
meanings.sent5: The ancient art of paganism connects people to the earth and sky.

meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of pagans.
meanings.sent1: Their pagan practices involve rituals in nature.
meanings.sent2: She studies the history of paganism.
meanings.sent3: At the pagan festival, they danced under the full moon.
meanings.sent4: The diversity of pagan beliefs is fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The essence of paganism is harmony with the natural world.

meanings.sent1: His paganism is a source of pride for him.
meanings.sent2: She embraces her paganism with joy.
meanings.sent3: In a world of paganism, every day is a celebration.
meanings.sent4: The paganism of their ancestors runs deep in their blood.
meanings.sent5: The freedom of paganism allows for personal spiritual exploration.
